thread.title: EC to launch sweeping review of post-crisis regulation
thread.title_full: EC to launch sweeping review of post-crisis regulation

author: Financial News
title: EC to launch sweeping review of post-crisis regulation
text:
EC to launch sweeping review of post-crisis regulation By James Rundle, Anna Irrera and Fareed Sahloul 25 September 2015 The European Commission is to launch a fresh, all-encompassing review of regulatory changes made in response to the financial crisis, as part of its push towards a Capital Markets Union â€“ a move that could ultimately see changes made to huge pieces of legislation, including Mifid II.
